sentences.english: This means repeatedly planting two rows of cereals followed by four rows of cowpeas .
sentences.chinese: 這意味着反覆種植兩排穀物其次是四排豇豆。

sentences.english: The cowpeas are placed on a black plastic sheet under the heat of the sun.
sentences.chinese: 該豇豆是放在一個黑色塑料板材下熱的太陽。

sentences.english: Cowpeas have a number of advantages over groundnuts.
sentences.chinese: 與花生相比豇豆有好幾種優點。

sentences.english: Cowpea crossbreeding has the problem that fructify cation is low auording to the traditional method.
sentences.chinese: 豇豆雜交育種按照傳統的方法存在坐果率低的問題。

sentences.english: The slender cowpea is a miniature of the unforgettable childhood.
sentences.chinese: 修長的豇豆，是難忘童年的縮影。

sentences.english: Effects of Klebsiella oxytoca on cowpea plant were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了施用催娩克氏菌菌劑對長豇豆的影響。

sentences.english: Cowpeas are also called black-eyed peas.
The cowpeas are placed in the first one, which is then put inside the other two.
sentences.chinese: 該豇豆是擺在第一位，然後把裏面其他兩個。

sentences.english: The photosynthetic characteristics of asparagus bean have been studied.
sentences.chinese: 以鄂豇豆二號品種爲材料，研究了豇豆的光合特性。

sentences.english: The photosynthetic characteristics of asparagus bean have been studied.
sentences.chinese: 以鄂豇豆二號品種爲材料，研究了豇豆的光合特性。

sentences.english: Several germplasm resources which were beneficial to cowpea breeding, were selected.
sentences.chinese: 篩選出了一些對豇豆遺傳育種有益的種質資源材料。

sentences.english: In north China's Shanxi province, tests on cowpeas were also conducted.
sentences.chinese: 在陝西省北部，豇豆檢測仍然進行中。

sentences.english: The sun-dried system cowpea silk has become here countryside a characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 曬制豇豆絲已成爲這裏農村的一個特色。

sentences.english: The cowpea crop growing at the base of the maize plants was infested with pod borers.
sentences.chinese: 玉米底部周圍種植的豇豆到處滋生着扁豆螟。

definition: eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
